China: Wu Cheng'en wrote Journey to the West.
Japan: Toyotomi Hideyoshi has prevailed over the Late Hōjō clan in the siege of Odawara in the Kantō region, completing the re-unification of Japan.
Philippine: Missionaries from the Society of Jesus established the Colegio de Manila in Intramuros.
Russia: Russo-Swedish War (1590–1595): The Treaty of Plussa expired. Russian troops laid siege to Narva. Russo-Swedish War (1590–1595): A Swedish governor on the disputed territory surrendered to Russians.
Taiwan: Chinese from Fujian start settling in southwestern Taiwan
